评论详情: My niece loved it but it was not the color she asked for nor the color I ordered. It made me furious when I saw it. It was too close to Christmas to have time to send back or even just replace. Luckily she liked it anyway. Beware of this…

The necklace is super durable and the clip is sturdy! Considering the price it’s surprisingly good quality. It’s super shiny, eye catching, and looks just like the photos! It’s the same size, color, and strength as advertised!
Just wanted to say this necklace looks like the image and is very pretty. I love to wear it and it’s exactly what I want. :D
They later really well and I wear them all the time. They don’t feel super cheap either
super cute necklaces but one came broken in half upon opening:/ low quality
It’s a bit shorter than I expected but it works for me

The design of the necklace is cute and looks great on me but the quality of it is compared to those cheap Mardi Gras necklaces. The beads and stars are all plastic except the chain links & clasp…will be returning.
at first i was worried because i didnt see any reviews but IT LOOKS EXACTLY LIKE IT. it doesnt feel cheap at all and i feel like it will last a long time.
